login.title: Make English easier
login.content: Website to do English exercise for children

footer.statement: Learning English takes a steady and continuous process with many different skills to develop. Special with young children also need supervision
footer.copyright: Â© 2022 - eWorkbook's copyright. All rights reserved

banner.title: English excercises become easier
banner.statement: Learning English takes a steady and continuous process with many different skills to develop. Special with young children also need supervision
banner.demoButton: Familiarize yourself with the types of exercises

discovery.title: Why you should choose eWorkbook
discovery.extraContent: We turn books into interactive exercises

card1.title: Learn and play
card1.content: This is a free site for students to learn English online. There is a selection of games that students can use to practice learning English in a fun way.

card2.title: Support teacher
card2.content: eWorkbook is an effective assistant for teachers, helping them to easily turn boring exercises in books to life based on a writing system that supports many types of exercises.

card3.title: Variety of exercise
card3.content: Our system provides tons of exercise type helping your children enhance their ability and develop to their fullest potential.

aboutUs.label: About us
aboutUs.title: We build a smart way to learn for children to develop the best
aboutUs.content: Making English no longer a fear of young people, creating excitement while learning and playing. Combining digital transformation, creating an environment for young people to access technology devices in the most appropriate way and the most modern learning trend

inform.label: Leave contact information for consultation
inform.success: Thank you for your contact information. We will contact you as soon as possible
inform.error: An error occurred. Please try again later

signIn_Out.failSignIn: Login failed, incorrect email or password
signIn_Out.presentation: Do English homework easier with the digital version
signIn_Out.incorrectEmailFormat: The input is not valid email
signIn_Out.incorrectPasswordFormat: Minimum eight characters, must compare aleast one number, one letter and one special character
signIn_Out.unmatchedPassword: The password and confirmation password do not match

exercise.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to submit?
exercise.examNotifyContent: Are you sure you want to do this exam?

wordsearch.findWords: Find below words in the table!
wordsearch.hint: Hover undiscovered word to see where it is!

exercise.question: Question
exercise.pleaseLoginContent: Please login for those excited exercises

history.descriptionToppart: All your learning-books and exercises will be stored hear. Let keep drilling them enriching your knowledge
history.name: Name

exerciseInstruction.fill-blank: Write answer into given blank space, the answer could be string or number
exerciseInstruction.multiple-choice: Check the box next to the answer which you think is correct
exerciseInstruction.match: Check the blank circle to connect entities
exerciseInstruction.unscramble: Unscramble the words by clicking the letters by the correct order
exerciseInstruction.wordsearch: Find the words in the table
exerciseInstruction.sort: Drag and drop to sort the elements.
exerciseInstruction.make-sentence: Choose the best options to fullfil the sentences.
exerciseInstruction.drag-and-drop: Drag the given word on top to the blank square near by the answer that you think may be correct
exerciseInstruction.pic-drag-and-drop: Drag the given word on top to the blank square attached to the correct answer inside the picture
exerciseInstruction.crossword: Fill in the blanks with words based on hints
exerciseInstruction.linewordsearch: Find the word in the random string by coloring it.
exerciseInstruction.listening: Tap the speaker to hear the audio then drag the corresponding answer to the blank square

profile.passwordFormat: Minimum eight characters, must compare aleast one number, one letter and one special character
profile.passwordNotMatch: The password and confirmation password do not match

forgetPassword.checkMailBoxMessage: Email sent, please check your mail box for reset link!
forgetPassword.theEmailNotRegister: The email does not registered yet!

checkpoint.bad: You should try again to get better score
checkpoint.middle: You do quite well, you can try again to get better score
checkpoint.good: You do well, you can try again to get better score
checkpoint.excellent: You do well, keep it up!
checkpoint.perfect: You are perfect!, let try next lesson
checkpoint.private: View score feature hidden by teachers
